entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
